short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logs Network Requests from OmniStudio FlexCard, OmniScript for actions like Integration Procedure, Remote Actions, Data Raptors etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Simplify Debugging for OmniStudio 🚀

The Salesforce OmniStudio Network Logger is a powerful Chrome extension that captures and logs network requests made by OmniStudio components like FlexCards, OmniScripts, and actions such as Integration Procedures, Remote Actions, and Data Raptors. This extension streamlines the debugging process, helping you pinpoint issues without the usual hassle.

Key Features
📡 Logs Network Requests: Automatically captures all requests from OmniStudio components : FlexCard, OmniScript.
🛠️ Easy Debugging: Debug OmniScripts and FlexCards effortlessly, saving time and improving productivity.
🔍 Search & Filter: Quickly find the requests you care about with robust search and filtering options.
🌑 Dark Mode: Work comfortably in low-light conditions with a sleek dark mode interface.

Take your OmniStudio debugging experience to the next level!

Future Scope :
📌Save Requests to Local Storage / Export 
📌UI Enhancements to display proper source (Omniscript/FlexCard) , namespace
📌More action types from OmniScript / FlexCard
